summary: Thought I would throw up the tattoo skin I personally use, thought someone may enjoy it. The lettering on her side is dragon script for Dovahkiin.
descriptionHtml:
Thought I would throw up the tattoo skin I personally use, thought someone may enjoy it. The lettering on her side is dragon script for Dovahkiin. Uses the latest texture file from Dimon\'s UNP.

For best results install a custom race or use the custom races mod or every female in game will have it, and that just kind of ruins it.

It\'s NMM or Wrye bash ready, but again I would recommend a manual install into a custom race. Just overwrite the femalebody_1.dds with this one.

Credit goes to Dimon99 and his UNP Body. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709[/url]
author: ServantOfSin
